message: Let's start fair.  I'll take the lion's share, but you get something to start with.
Let's split it 50/50, no need to be greedy
Okay, I'm willing to compromise a bit, but I still need to get more than you.
I'll give you a bit more, but I still want a fair share
Let's be realistic - we're both losing money with each round.  I'm willing to give you more, but I need to get the majority.
I'm getting desperate, but I still want a decent share
Time is running out.  I'm giving you more, but I'm not going to give you more than half.
I'm getting close to giving up, but I still want a decent chunk
We're both going to lose a lot if we don't settle soon.  This is my final offer.
I'm taking a risk, but I think I can get a better deal
We're both going to get nothing if we don't settle now. I'm giving you a better share than you deserve.
